sentences.en: Each of the credit items can be thought of as an outflow of value.
sentences.cn: 每一贷方项目都可以看作是一笔价值流出.

sentences.en: Eg: The balancing capital outflow has become a huge inflow.
sentences.cn: 平衡的资本流出,已经变为巨额资本流入.

sentences.en: Financing , cash inflow and outflow management and risk analysis.
sentences.cn: 资金的筹划与使用及其安全风险性分析.

sentences.en: Fund, QFII, T - type ( insurance ) funds showed a net outflow of the same.
sentences.cn: 基金 、 QFII 、 T 类 ( 保险 ) 资金呈现出一致的净流出.

sentences.en: If the outflow falls the average duration of unemployment will correspondingly rise.
sentences.cn: 若流出人数下降,则失业的平均持续期将相应上升.

sentences.en: Inflow and outflow boundary conditions for the method were given t.
sentences.cn: 针对此方法,给出了一种来流和出流边界条件的提法.

sentences.en: It is they that most fear an outflow of undeclared funds.
sentences.cn: 正是这些银行最担心未申报资金的流出.

sentences.en: Kirchhoff's current law postulates that the total current outflow from any p oint is 0.
sentences.cn: 基尔霍夫电流定律要求从任何点流出的总电流为0.

sentences.en: Our hearts are touched and there is an outflow of our emotions.
sentences.cn: 我们的心被触摸而使我们情感流露.

sentences.en: The company is trying every means to prevent the outflow of capital.
sentences.cn: 公司正在想尽一切办法防止资产外溢.

sentences.en: The excess of inflow over outflow goes into storage in the control box in two ways.
sentences.cn: 流入超过流出的质量以两种形式贮存在控制体中.

sentences.en: The mechanism of corticosteroid - induced ocular hypertension is increased aqueous outflow resistance.
sentences.cn: 类固醇诱导性高眼压的发生机制是房水流出阻力的增加.

sentences.en: The outflow of gold can temporarily finance the balance of payments deficit.
sentences.cn: 黄金外流可以暂时填补国际收支的逆差.

sentences.en: There was a capital outflow of $22 billion in 1998.
There was a net outflow of about £50m in short-term capital.
sentences.cn: 短期资金净流出额大约为5,000万英镑。

trans.tran_en: when money, goods etc leave a bank, country etc
